attributes.action: Bring controll to premium rate tv quiz shows.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring legislation in to ensure that call in quiz shows are regulated correctly and as a gambling institution have a responsibility to its players under the responsible gambling act and in addition to make its players aware of the odds of winning.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
